INSERT INTO REVIEW_HEART (HEART_NO, USER_ID, REVIEW_NO) VALUES (SEQ_HEART_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{reviewNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW_TBL SET REVIEW_CONTENT = #{reviewContent}, REVIEW_FILENAME = #{reviewFilename}, REVIEW_FILERENAME = #{reviewFileRename}, REVIEW_FILEPATH = #{reviewFilepath}, R_UPDATE_DATE = DEFAULT WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REVIEW_TBL WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY REVIEW_NO ASC
